1934 June 4, 2017), nke a makwaara dịka Washington Xisolo, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na South Africa nke ndị na-ege ntị maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Jwara na usoro telivisheneng SABC 1, Emzini Wezinsizwa O sokwa mee ihe nkiri dịka Bhebhe na miniseries nke afọ 1986, Shaka Zulu, yana ọtụtụ ihe nkiri mba ụwa, gụnyere Ernest Goes to Africa (1997) na Who Am I? (1998), n'ihu Jackie Chan.
A mụrụ Sixolo na Springs na East Rand, South Africa. Ọ malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya na ngwụcha afọ 1970. Sixolo bụkwa onye guzobere otu Kings Messengers Quartet a ma ama.

Sixolo, onye nwere ọtụtụ ọrịa, dara ezigbo ọrịa n'ọnwa June 3, afọ 2017, mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ya na Orlando West, Soweto. A kpọgara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Chris Hani Baragwanath dị na Soweto, ebe ọ nwụrụ na June 4, 2017, mgbe ọ dị afọ 83.
